duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform routine maintenance and adjustments on class 7 and 8 diesel equipment, forklifts, and trailing equipment
Repair or rebuild all or parts of various equipment systems
Work in accordance with DOT, EPA, Interstate Authority, OSHA, and other rules and regulations
Conduct safety inspections on equipment and prepare safety documentation
Maintain proficiency with equipment and technologies that enhance productivity
Operate a hostler in all types of weather; safely walk and stand for extended periods of time

education_certification.credential: 2 years of experience in general heavy truck repair for commercial fleet operations
EPA HVAC Refrigerant Recovery and Recycling Certification within 90 days of hire
Basic welding skills (Oxy/Acetylene, MIG and ARC)
Own hand tools for tractor-trailer repairs
